title: 5 Things to avoid while travelling in India
text:
Travel Articles | October 23, 2015 
The country, India, which is so diverse and unique in every possible aspects is a must visit destination and it also never misses the mark to surprise us and lefts us amazed for many more times to come. This is the exemplifying beauty of this country. 
India, 
India which is huge nation with lists of places to visit and each one has some unique features and even different kinds of landscapes as we move from one place to another and also having drastic lingual changes even with the rare change of panorama is sometimes seem to be very magical, but like every other beautiful things in the world, it has some spot also. The place which is so diversified and yet unique needs to be travel for once, thatâ€™
